extendedInfo.description: A quick & easy to use countdown timer, alarm clock and stopwatch application. Simple and reliable to use for: exercise timer, sports timer, meeting timer, cooking timer, lap timer, work timer, parking timer, training, kitchen, etc. Featuring:Preset time buttons for most common timersDesktop widgets and/or Multiple alarms listVibrate optionsSelectable Snooze Time featureRecord Laps on stopwatchRepeating Alarms at any intervalSelect any ringtone or alarm soundOne touch start for common countdown timersOption to start a stopwatch when timer expiresNotification optionsColor themesLarge desk clock displayLarge countdown timer displayAlarms can have a name/description/reasonNotes -Ads require internet access. If ads are not OK, please try our paid version.To switch to OneTouch mode, turn on the option that says "Start timer when time is selected".*** Warning - the large counter/clock displays are intended for use while charging - the screen does not time out!Since Google does not send market comments to developers, please send all problem reports and change requests to the developer email address - andrexxapps@gmail.com

reviews.title: What a handy app!
reviews.comment: Reliable. Easy to use. User interface simple & intuitive. Wish developer would  prettify it now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: move to SD?
reviews.comment: Love this timer, but I can\'t afford a phone with lots of memory, so anything I can move to the SD card is a bonus...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app. I had a small issue but the developer replied to me right away. I got the problem fixed & am now happy go give a 5 star rating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Widget doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Just like OneTouch Timer, this widget just shows an empty square on my home screen. LQ Optimus Q (LGL55C). Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very useful!
reviews.comment: At last a timer with alarm that works. Interface a bit cluttered compared to HTC timer but features work well on Gal Nexus. Will recommend.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Review
reviews.comment: Very good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Outstanding!
reviews.comment: Extremely easy to set different times on the timer.

reviews.title: Junk
reviews.comment: Complete junk

reviews.title: Not as good as previous
reviews.comment: works. Has ads. Not loud enough. Didn\'t hear alarm in my pocket
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does what it says
reviews.comment: Works well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Weird
reviews.comment: Has started sounding off when phone boots up and will not uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: not pretty, but powerful
reviews.comment: It\'s not as pretty as Timers4Me, but its very functional. I do wish it had talking countdown and the ability to start counting up (chrono) when a timer hits zero - two features ultrachron has. But ultrachron doesn\'t have multiple timers. I would pay and 5* if it had those two things.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is unreliable and erratic - sometimes the alarm works and sometimes it doesn\'t. Once I find a replacement I will uninstall it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Alarms after reboot.
reviews.comment: That\'s annoying. Fix that and it\'s a 5 star apply.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs Gradual Volume Increase
reviews.comment: Freaks me out of me when it goes off on loudest.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best timer ever
reviews.comment: No need to type anything on the keyboard, just hit the pre set time buttons n add them up as needed.super quick n practical! Droid razr
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best timer

reviews.title: Odd...
reviews.comment: Has started sounding on reboot for no reason.

reviews.title: Irritating autostart
reviews.comment: The app autostarts on reeboot. N1 2.3.4

reviews.title: Alarms every time phone boots
reviews.comment: This used to be a great app, but now every time you boot your phone, the alarm goes off
